dublin_core.dcvalue: Tremendous progress is being made by several countries to develop their digital health strategy policy and roadmap Governments have mapped the landscape of mHealth projects developed frameworks for policy development developed an eHealth architecture and are linking this work to improvements in key areas of the health system Come to this combination presentation and fireside chat with representatives from Ethiopia Kenya Malawi and Tanzania to learn about the successes challenges and opportunities they experienced Speakers include Dr Stephen Mburu University of NairobiIsaac Dambula Deputy Director of Planning Ministry of Health and Population MalawiOtilia Flavian Gowelle Director of training and Human Resource Development for Health Ministry of Health TanzaniaNetsanet Nigussie Systems Analyst John Snow Inc JSI
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-22T10:51:59Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 binder3.pdf: 3672989 bytes, checksum: fa2e91edd56f34b539ec893c97841233 (MD5)
Fireside Chat: Country Experiences with Strategy and Governance
